alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Echols (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 30 at 10:52AM EST until November 30 at 11:45AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hamilton County in northern Florida... Echols County in southeastern Georgia... West central Clinch County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 1145 AM EST. * At 1051 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Moody Air Force Base to 7 miles southwest of Lake Park, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jasper, Jennings, Statenville, Mayday, Needmore, Blue Springs and Crossroads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
